Text.Page:
Titus accepted the request to build a siege weapon. Titus needed "Ruby Durignite", which retrieved from Barbtail Coulee.
After completing the weapon, fired the cannon at Exodor, but the attack was reflected and destroyed the federation's firebase near Hana Hot Springs.

Titus accepted the request to build a siege weapon. Titus needed "Ruby Durignite", which retrieved from Barbtail Coulee.
After completing the weapon, fired the cannon at Exodor, but the attack was reflected and destroyed the federation's firebase near Hana Hot Springs.

That Exodor you speak of is a huge floating fortress. To take down a skycastle, I need more than a small forge in a village.

Why yes, I need setup like Muhrak has.
We should go meet him.

! What brings you all the way here?
Have you come to repair your gear?

Wait, is that Titus?"Surprised to see him?"

It has been a while. I honestly thought he was dead.

His weapons, we'd never seen anything like them. He was a hero who never wanted credit, just a challenge.

You always keep good company, ."It is what it is."

Muhrak is inside.

You can show yourself in.

Why if it isn't a special guest! My old friend Titus, back after all this time. And !

I am happy to see you both, but I fear that you've come together for a grand purpose. Am I right? "We need a weapon. A big one."

A weapon? But yours fits you so well.

Of course, I could make a better one.

What are you fighting. Argons? Giants?"Think bigger. Much bigger."

Bigger than an argon?

You should tell me the whole story."Well..."

That is big.

Alright. let's get to work. It will be just like the old days, Titus. We'll build a weapon worthy of a god!

Of course, we'll need your help too, . Someone has to gather materials!

To build the masterpiece I have in mind, I needed a place like this.

It's impossible to build such a thing in an ordinary forge.

We need to talk to Muhrak.

Time to go to work, .

Exodor isn't going to destroy itself
"Where do we go now?"

The most important thing I need is Ruby Durignite. Most things we can buy from the Badge Merchants or at the Amadjuak Trading Post, but money isn't the problem here. It's time we don't have.

You have to get it at the source."Ruby Durignite?"

Never heard of it?
It's a mineral found in the Barbtail Coulee and Sienna Canyon. Put that in your cannon and you can pulverize anything.

Leave me to the cannon. I'll send out a messenger. Give him the Ruby Durignite as soon as you've found it.

You'll probably spot a couple of Mysterium Researchers in the Wyvern Watch, they might know a thing or two about it. Most researchers do.
Hello! My name is Zalik. How may I help you?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Do you know what Ruby Durignite is?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Of course, yes. It's a extremely rare ore.
I've never seen it myself-even my supervisor has only seen it once, and that was back in the Argon War.

I've heard it's extremely valuable-and extremely explosive."Do you know where to find it?"

If there's any left around here, it would be deep in the Barbtail Coulee.

If you're planning to explore the area search for it, you'd better be careful. I've seen many people go in, and very few come back.

!

It's good to see you again. What brings you here today"I'm looking for Ruby Durignite."

Ruby Durignite? You came all the way here alone to find that?

I know you're a skilled combatant, but some things are best left buried. Although, having seen you in action, I think you might be able to handle it."Don't worry about me."

Take this potion anyway. It's proof against even the worst burns, and I've always got some with me when I'm in the field.
Also, you may have to kill a few Dracoloths.

Jerad knows his way around the Barbtail Coulee, he'll be able to help you out more.

I understand you're on the way to Barbtail Coulee looking for Ruby Durignite.

You'll find alkus which can be a serious burden, but knowing you, they won't be a problem.

Just be careful, they're very irritable, and whatever you do, make sure you don't look them in the eye!
The Durignite shines brightly, but turns dark red in your hand.

You must be . Titus is waiting for you.

Look at that brilliant color...

I never thought I'd see such a valuable material."Be careful , it explodes."

Umm...okay. I will. You can count on me.

Say, can you look after Berus for a while? A dracoloth attacked us on the way here and burned him.

We used Vergos' potion on him, but he's still in severe pain."How can I help?"

Please gather some Salixia Flowers.

It's not a perfect remedy, but chewing Salixia petals might ease the pain.
Do you have the Ruby Durignite with you?

Argh...

I feel so faint... the pain!

If I had a Salixia Flower, I could at least relieve the agony...

Argh...

So much pain...
Urgh...

Thank you very much. An aman mustn't show weakness, so please, let's keep this between ourselves.

I won't forget your help . The day I become a full weaponsmith, I will make you the finest weapon!

You should hurry to Firebase Exodor. Master Titus should be done with his new weapon by now.

You're here, .

I heard that you took a visit to Muhrak's Workshop, but I never thought that I'd see Titus again.

With Titus's new weapon, it's only a matter of time before Exodor falls.

So... that huge thing is the Exodor you were talking about?

Take a good look at it while you can. My weapon will soon turn it in to dust. "It might be tougher than the Argons."

Nonsense. My weapon's destructive capability is unparalleled!

It'll only take a single shot.
I have no doubt that Titus's weapon will take down Exodor for good.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Is there any news?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
We've been cautious, but it's not moved yet. We should take it down as fast as we can. Please, you should have the honor of firing the Challenger Cannon.

How... how can this be...?

(Ryshan looks shocked.)"We need to stay calm."

I've never seen such a...

I cast a barrier as soon as I could... but I couldn't cover everyone...

That thing reflected my weapon's attack!

How dare those...!"We should regroup..."
That weird purple light almost blinded me.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Purple light?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Right before the Challenger Cannon fired, I saw a flash of purple. You know the rest.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'm glad you're okay."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I'm alright... go and take care of the others.

My weapon didn't work... inconcievable!
